text: (ye naseehat isalie hai) taaki tum yaad rakho pas agar tum un gharon mein kisee ko na pao to taavaaqaphiyat ki tum ko (khaas taur par) ijaazat na haasil ho jae un mein na jao aur agar tum se kaha jae ki phir jao to tum (be taammul) phir jao yahee tumhaare vaaste jyaada saphaee kee baat hai aur tum jo kuchh bhee karate ho khuda usase khoob vaakif hai
